443 
 
  
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
with options in Economics, Accounting, 
Political Science and Geography/Physics.  
UNN     with 
options in:  
Edu. Geography/Physics  
Edu. Pol Science  
Edu. Social Studies  
Edu. Economics  
 UYO      
     
UTME 
(i)  
(ii)  
  (iii)  
  
IBADAN does not accept Home Economics. Accepts 
TC II (1967-1981).  Also requires five (5) or six (6) ‘O’ 
level credit passes at one (1) or two (2) sitting(s) to 
include English Language and other subjects from 
Arts, Social Sciences or Sciences.  
EBSU requires 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics. 
PHC requires subject(s) relevant to the teaching 
subject(s). It requires Mathematics for Economics 
and Accounting. Political Sciencerequires 
Government or History.  
    (iv)     UNN requires  
    (a)  five (5) 'O’ level credit passes including English 
Language, a science subject and the subject to be 
combined with education.  
    (b)  for Social Studies/Education: 'O' level credit 
passes in three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects 
are required.  
    (c)  'O' level credit passes in Mathematics and 
Economics for Education/Economics.  
    (d)  'O' level credit pass in Government for Political  
Science/Education  
    (e)  'O' level credit pass in Geography, plus any other 
three (3) subjects and a pass in Mathematics for 
Education/Geography.  
    (v)  NDU requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, and any other 
three (3)relevant subjects, two (2) of which must 
be Social Sciences subjects at not more than two 
(2) sittings.  
  
      
UTME SUBJECTS  
UNN requires  
(i)  for  Education/Geography:  English 
 Language, Geography, plus any other two (2) 
subjects
